Ira Silverman Railroad Menu Collection--Series 24. Northern Pacific Railway Company--Sub-Series 1. Menus

Items on menu: Cocktails; Dinner; Salads; Sandwiches; Desserts; Beverage list. Meals served: Dinner. Representative dishes: Consomme Orsay or Chilled Pineapple Juice; Roast Duckling, Peanut Dressing—Apple Sauce, N.P. Big Baked Potato, Garden Peas, Tomato Parisienne, Corn Muffins or Holy-Ry; Choice of Dessert, Coffee or Tea (Hot or Iced) or Milk ($3.90)

The images on this web site are from material in the collections of the Transportation Library of Northwestern University Libraries, are provided for use by its students, faculty and staff, and by other researchers visiting this site, for research consultation and scholarly purposes only. Homepage at Northwestern University Libraries Digital Collections

The Ira Silverman Railroad Menu Collection consists of 238 items: 227 menus and eleven pamphlets. 35 United States and Canadian railroads are represented in the collection. All menus were issued by their respective railroad.
